Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.example.card_management_system.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/user/") public class UserController extends Object
REST controller for handling user-related operations such as retrieving cards, submitting block requests, executing transactions, and withdrawing funds.

All endpoints are prefixed with /api/user/ and require authentication.

      cardService - the card service
      blockCardRequestService - the block card request service
      transactionService - the transaction service
      userDetailsService - the user details service

  • Method Details

    • getAllUserCards

      @GetMapping("/cards") public List<CardDto> getAllUserCards()
      Retrieves all cards owned by the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      list of user's cards

    • getBlockCardRequest

      @PostMapping("/cards/{id}/block_request") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getBlockCardRequest(@PathVariable Long id)
      Submits a request to block a card.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card to block
      Returns:
      confirmation message

    • getAllCardTransactions

      @GetMapping("/cards/{id}/transactions") public List<TransactionDto> getAllCardTransactions(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves all transactions for a specific card if the card belongs to the current user.
      Parameters:
      id - the card ID
      Returns:
      list of transactions, or null if unauthorized

    • addCardTransaction

      @PostMapping("/cards/transaction") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addCardTransaction(@RequestBody TransactionDto transactionDto)
      Executes a transaction between two cards owned by the user.
      Parameters:
      transactionDto - the transaction details
      Returns:
      response message indicating success or failure
